SELECT BBS_NO , BBS_NAME , FN_GET_CODE_NAME('B001', BBS_TYPE) AS BBS_TYPE , TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERT_DATE FROM BBS
AND BBS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND BBS_TYPE = #{type}
ORDER BY BBS_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM BBS

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.MEMBER_PHONENUM , A.MEMBER_AUTOR , A.MEMBER_BRITHDAY , A.MEMBER_LOCATION , A.MEMBER_LOCATION_DTL , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_PW , A.MEMBER_PW_QUESTION , A.MEMBER_PW_ANSWER , A.MEMBER_IMAGE_NO , B.FILE_PATH FROM MEMBER A , ( SELECT FILE_NO , FILE_PATH || '/'|| SAVE_FILE_NAME || FILE_EXTEN AS FILE_PATH FROM FILE_REPOSITROY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ) B WHERE A.MEMBER_IMAGE_NO = B.FILE_NO (+) AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
